title: Trump Deepens Dollar Woes, Saying He’s Not Concerned About Slump
description: The dollar sank, deepening a four-day selloff that’s sent it to the lowest since early 2022, after President Donald Trump indicated he’s comfortable with those declines.
content: The dollar sank, deepening a four-day selloff that’s sent it to the lowest since early 2022, after President Donald Trump indicated he’s comfortable with those declines.
